general_setting.title: General Setting
general_setting.subtitle: Configure the fundamental information of the site.

logo_favicon.title: Logo and Favicon
logo_favicon.subtitle: Upload your logo and favicon here.

system_configuration.title: System Configuration
system_configuration.subtitle: Control all of the basic modules of the system.

notification_setting.title: Notification Setting
notification_setting.subtitle: Control and configure overall notification elements of the system.

seo_configuration.title: SEO Configuration
seo_configuration.subtitle: Configure proper meta title, meta description, meta keywords, etc to make the system SEO-friendly.

manage_frontend.title: Manage Frontend
manage_frontend.subtitle: Control all of the frontend contents of the system.

manage_pages.title: Manage Pages
manage_pages.subtitle: Control dynamic and static pages of the system.

manage_templates.title: Manage Templates
manage_templates.subtitle: Control frontend template of the system.

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Configure your required languages and keywords to localize the system.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.subtitle: Manage extensions of the system here to extend some extra features of the system.

policy_pages.title: Policy Pages
policy_pages.subtitle: Configure your policy and terms of the system here.

maintenance_mode.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance_mode.subtitle: Enable or disable the maintenance mode of the system when required.

gdpr_cookie.title: GDPR Cookie
gdpr_cookie.subtitle: Set GDPR Cookie policy if required. It will ask visitor of the system to accept if enabled.

custom_css.title: Custom CSS
custom_css.subtitle: Write custom css here to modify some styles of frontend of the system if you need to.

sitemap.title: Sitemap XML
sitemap.subtitle: Insert the sitemap XML here to enhance SEO performance.

robots.title: Robots txt
robots.subtitle: Insert the robots.txt content here to enhance bot web crawlers and instruct them on how to interact with certain areas of the website.
